_sText: Hi dear CS:S-Gamer, here is Project afterSource with an other release for CounterStrike Source de_aztec_aftersource (beta1.10) ...here some additional screens: Here are some facts and figures about the map "de_aztec_aftersource" : new models... new textures (including all normalmaps und partially specularmaps) but basically the same play expiry as it is known in the original map! In the screenshot gallery you can get some impressions of the map and selected models! If you want to get an idea of the realism and the game expiry, download and play the map! VERY IMPORTANT: You have to turn on the color correction in the option menu, under graphics. The map has a color correction entity, which brings up the real athmosphere! Credits: Special thanks to my Wingman Stubu, which spend a lot of time with testing the project. Further on thanks to the great RumpelBumpel - Clan! RumpelBumpel (Project Coordinator) contact: aftersource@rumpelbumpel.de HP: http://aftersource.rumpelbumpel.de/ Mod Project Sites: http://www.fpsbanana.com/studios/21601 http://www.moddb.com/mods/counterstrike-aftersource
